content.query:
CREATE TABLE dbo.DimProduct
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
AS
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ProductID) AS ProductKey,
    ProductID as ProductAltKey,
    ProductName,
    ProductCategory,
    ListPrice
FROM dbo.StageProduct;
GO

SELECT * FROM dbo.DimProduct;

--create stg table from git dimproduct
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [YourExternalDataSource]
WITH (
    TYPE = HADOOP,
    LOCATION = 'https://<your_storage_account>.dfs.core.windows.net/<container>',
    CREDENTIAL = [YourCredential]
);

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [YourFileFormat]
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2
    )
);

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[YourExternalTable] (
    Column1 INT,
    Column2 NVARCHAR(50),
    Column3 DATE
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/path/to/your/file/',
    DATA_SOURCE = [YourExternalDataSource],
    FILE_FORMAT = [YourFileFormat]
);
